on_tick.description: Called every game tick, so every 0.05 seconds.

get_world_position_of_block_entity.description: Gets the world position of a block_entity.

get_block_pos_x.description: Gets the X coordinate of a block_pos.

get_block_pos_y.description: Gets the Y coordinate of a block_pos.

get_block_pos_z.description: Gets the Z coordinate of a block_pos.

print_id.description: Prints an ID to the chat.

print_string.description: Prints a string to the chat.

print_i32.description: Prints an i32 to the chat.
